thread.section_title: Bolt Depot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bolt Depot | www.boltdepot.com
thread.title: Peter Staack
thread.title_full: Bolt Depot reviewed by Peter Staack

author: Peter Staack
title: Peter Staack
text: I'm really impressed at the vast selection of screws they have, the great user interface for finding things, all of their easy-to-read FAQs, their low prices, and the quality of their customer service. I lover ordering from Bolt Depot, any time we need screws or bolts for a project.
